thread.section_title: Optimalprint Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Optimalprint | optimalprint.com.au | 2 of 329
thread.title: Kati Collins

author: Kati Collins
title: Kati Collins
text:
I ordered 50 Wedding Thank You cards to be made up the 22nd December, so assumed that with the crazy time of year and Public Holidays I'd be waiting well over a week. I had them delivered to me on Christmas Eve! 2 days!
I was blown away by how fast the delivery time was, how easy the website was to navigate (not usually my strong points) and how beautiful the photos on the front of my cards turned out to be.
I'll be using Optimalprint for all my cards in the future.
